title: PQI v0.2.1 — The Architecture of Limitation in Code
description: Predictive Quality Index (PQI) is a privacy-first, relevance-realization framework for measuring prompt quality and ethical proportionality in AI systems. Version 0.2.1 extends the original PQI white paper by introducing a full audit chain, CI-safe reproducibility tools, and the restoration of the legacy radar visualization — preserving the mathematical and philosophical core under the Architecture of Limitation.
notes: All functionality from the original PQI white paper is preserved and reproducible. The audit chain, CI integration, and radar visualization are fully local — no personal data is collected or transmitted.
